channel.title: Growth Opportunities on FinanClub

item.title: AMCR
item.description: score:151 Chances: Amcor launches high-barrier performance paper packaging in North America, indicating growth opportunities. The company reported fiscal 2023 results and provided an outlook for fiscal 2024, which may attract investors. Amcor announces intent to acquire Moda Systems, showcasing expansion strategies. Amcor becomes the first flexible packaging company to offer certified-circular plastics in Australia and New Zealand, demonstrating sustainability efforts.
